item.description:
Pacifico - Happy Mojo Hour –
Quoting from The New York Times:
"There is a deliciously lively air to the place – due in no small measure to the excellent mojitos – and the people are having too good a time to be restrained by convention…In short, Pacifico is a find. It is just a millimeter short of excellence, and that will not be long in coming"

Favorites are the sangria and award winning mojitos (Best Mojito – CT Magazine ‘08 & ‘09) which will surely liven your day

$5 Mojito and Margaritas and half-priced select draft beer. Complimentary tapas. Wjat a great way to spend an evening!!! Hope to see you there!


JOIN US WHENEVER YOU CAN!!!!!!
I am sure we will be going strong way into the evening!!!!
My cell is 203-974-3170 if you want to check to make sure

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Happy "Mojo " Hour at Pacifico
